attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The public should be restricted from buying fireworks and only licence holders (Event Organisers) should be able to purchase fireworks for organised events such as Bon Fire night, New Years Eve, The Military Tattoo and music festivals. There are many safety and enviromental issues that arise from the misuse of fireworks that could be avoided by bringing restrictions.

rejection.details: This pettion overlaps with several already in existence:   http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/FireWork-Shows/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
